name: Nome
no-production-types: Nenhum tipo de produção adicionado ainda
necessary data: Please check if you filled all necessary data.
readme hint: For details, have a look at the README file
calc url hint: Link where the result of a level gets posted. A JSON is expected (definition in README)
hex hint alpha: A hex value in format #AABBCC or #AABBCCDD
tiff value hint: The value in the tiff file which gets converted to this colour
maps explanation: Definition of the maps. If you selected field mode, you need at least two suitability maps and one consequence map. If you selected zones mode, you need at least two suitability maps, at least two consequence maps, exact one zone map and exact one background map. Please make sure that all maps have the same size, otherwise the correct display of the maps can not be guaranteed.
icon url hint: URL to the image which is shown on production type
max elements hint: Set to 0 if there is no limit for this production type
map color hint: The colour the map gets coloured in
custom color explanation: The custom colours are only needed if there is a zone map which need a specific mapping of values in the tiff to certain colours. Otherwhise you can skip this step.
